The Strategy PhD

because we bring an
interdisciplinary perspective

to important phenomenological
questions in strategy.

At the same time,
we're not locked

into a specific
discipline, so we

can approach strategy
questions from the perspective

political science,
anthropology, and more and more.

And it's very entrepreneurial

to explore all
sorts of new ideas

And we provide the
resources and the mentorship

advance that research
and have an impact.

I'm excited about conducting
research, teaching,

AI.
